Field.ElementLabel:
Instructions: We have listed 24 symptoms below. Read each one carefully. If you have had the symptom during the past week, let us know how OFTEN you had it, how SEVERE it was usually and how much it DISTRESSED or BOTHERED you by selecting the appropriate number. If you DID NOT HAVE the symptom, mark the "NO" circle.

DURING THE PAST WEEK
Did you have any of the following symptoms?
Difficulty concentrating
How OFTEN did you have difficulty concentrating?
How SEVERE was the difficulty concentrating usually?
How much did the difficulty concentrating DISTRESS or BOTHER you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, Not at all 
 1, A Little Bit 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Quite a Bit 
 4, Very Much
